{"title": "Sandship: Crafting Factory", "title_search": "sandship crafting factory", "title_keyword": "sandship crafting factory", "url": "https://www.metacritic.com/game/sandship-crafting-factory/", "summary": "From the developers of Deep Town, Sandship is a factory management game set in a post-apocalyptic sci-fi universe. You control the last remaining sandship: a gigantic, artificially intelligent mega-factory, which roams across the endless deserts of a far-away planet.
